title: Bug 21834 - Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: When deleting items from the Coolbar, the layout becomes corrupted in Build 2002071610021.
OB: Press the Delete button. This will delete the first item on the second row. Notice that the Launch item is moved to the first row when the delete occurs. The Launch item should stay on the second row.
EB: After pressing the Delete button, the layout should remain intact and the Launch item should stay on the second row.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Coolbar. 
2. Press the Delete button. 
3. Verify that the first item on the second row is deleted. 
4. Observe that the Launch item is moved to the first row instead of staying on the second row.
